Related Character(s): 鑱
Связанный символ (и): 鑱

艬字的基本解释

艬
chán
船。

艬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chán］
［《廣韻》鋤銜切，平銜，崇。］
［《廣韻》士懺切，去鑑，崇。］
合木船。宋陆游《入蜀记》卷六：“初得艬船，差小，然底闊而輕，於上灘爲便。”按，《广韵·平銜》：“艬，合木船。”一说，大船。见《玉篇·舟部》。

艬字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【舟字部】　艬； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1013第16
【廣韻】【集韻】?鋤銜切，音巉。【玉篇】大船也。【廣韻】合木船。　又【廣韻】士懺切，音鑱。義同。

艬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
艬字的起名意思

暂无。

large ship
Basic explanation of words
large ship
chán
ferry.
large ship
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chán］
["Guangyun" hoe title cut, flat title, Chong. ]
["Guangyun" scholars repent, go to Jian, Chong. ]
Hemu boat. Song Luyou's "Entry to Shu" Volume 6: "I got a boat at first, the difference is small, but the bottom is wide and light, it is convenient to go to the beach." Press, "Guangyun·Pingxian": "The boat, the wooden boat." One said , The big ship. See "Yu Pian·Bo Bu".
large ship

[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Hoe title cut, sound cut. [Jade articles] The big ship is also. [Guangyun] He wooden boats.　[Guangyun] Shi repents and cuts, and the sound is Rong. The same meaning.
